name: OrderLookupParent
description:
PUT this object to see LOOKUP in action.
{ "@metadata":  {"action":"INSERT"}, "Customer": { "@metadata": { "action":"LOOKUP",  "key":"Name"}, "Name":"Alpha and Sons"}, "Items":[ { "Product": { "@metadata": {"action":"LOOKUP", "key":"ProductName"}, "ProductName":"Hammer"}, "Quantity": 1} ]}
